@Testcase 3

dmem

0x00000000 2

0x00000004 8

0x00000008 13

0x0000000C 15

0x00000010 9

0x00000014 7

0x00000018 3

0x0000001C 5

0x00000020 -2

0x00000024 -6

imem

0x0000000 lw $a0 0x0004 $zero (地址4的值(8)存到$a0) ($a0 = 8)

0x00000004 lw $a1 0x0008 $a0 (地址16的值(9)存到$a1) ($a1 = 9)

0x00000008 addu $a2 $a0 $a1 ($a2 = 8+9 = 17)

0x0000000C halt


1 lw $a0 0x0004 $zero = 0x8C040004 = 10001100000001000000000000000100

2 lw $a1 0x0008 $a0 = 0x8C850008 = 10001100100001010000000000001000

3 addu $a2 $a0 $a1 = 0x00853021 = 00000000100001010011000000100001

4 halt = 0xFFFFFFFF = 11111111111111111111111111111111
